confirm_signup.subject: Welcome to Focus Timer - Confirm Your Email 🎯
confirm_signup.body_html:
🎯 Focus Timer

Welcome to Focus Timer!

Thanks for signing up! We're excited to help you boost your productivity with the Pomodoro Technique and advanced focus tools.

Please confirm your email address to get started with your productivity journey:

Confirm Email Address

What you'll get:

  • 🍅 Customizable Pomodoro timer
  • 📊 Productivity analytics and insights
  • 🎯 Goal tracking and achievements
  • 💬 AI-powered productivity assistant
  • 📱 Chrome extension for seamless workflow

This link expires in 24 hours for security.

If you didn't create this account, please ignore this email.

Focus Timer - Productivity Reimagined

If you have any questions, reply to this email or visit our help center.

reset_password.subject: Reset Your Focus Timer Password 🔒
reset_password.body_html:
🔒 Focus Timer

Password Reset Request

We received a request to reset your Focus Timer password.

Click the button below to create a new password:

Reset Password

Security Notice:
  • This link expires in 1 hour for your security
  • If you didn't request this reset, please ignore this email
  • Your password will remain unchanged until you click the link above
  • Never share this link with anyone

If you continue to have problems, please contact our support team.

Focus Timer - Productivity Reimagined

This is an automated security email. Please do not reply.
